surveyIntroduction: This section of I-DECIDE walks you through some questions and activities to help you think about the health of your relationship with the partner or ex-partner who has made you feel afraid or unsafe.
surveyIntroductionHtmlB64:
My Relationship Health

This section of I-DECIDE walks you through some questions and activities to help you think about the health of your relationship with the partner or ex-partner who has made you feel afraid or unsafe.

What is a healthy relationship?

Sometimes, it can be difficult to tell Whether a relationship is healthy or unhealthy because we docs't have anything to compare it to. Generally, a healthy relationship involves:

  • Mutual trust and shared power
  • Support and open communicarion
  • Commitment and honesty
An unhealthy relationship involves:
  • Unsupportive behaviour
  • Misuse of power and authority
  • Pain, fear or harm

Most couples have arguments and fights, but this does not necessarily mean your relationship is unhealthy. However , when one person is feeling unsafe or afraid in the relationship, this is usually a sign that there are serious problems. It is a good idea to regularly assess your relationship using the scales below.

surveySections.sectionTitleText: Your relationship with the current or ex-partner

questions.questionText: How unhealthy do you think your relationship is with your partner or ex-partner? (10 is very unhealthy and 0 is not at all unhealthy)
Are you afraid of having an unhealthy relationship? (10 is very afraid and 0 is not at all afraid)
